sen.j: 藤原小忌古曾（ふじわら の こぎこそ、生没年不詳）または藤原古木古曾は、平安時代の女性貴族で藤原相通の妻にあたる。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Kogikoso (dates of birth and death unknown), written as "藤原古木古曾" or "藤原古木古曾," was a female noble in the Heian period who was a wife of FUJIWARA no Sukemichi.
FUJIWARA no Kogikoso (dates of birth and death unknown), written as "藤原古木古曾" or "藤原古木古曾," was a noble female during the Heian period who was the wife of FUJIWARA no Sukemichi.
FUJIWARA no Kogikoso (year of birth and death unknown), written as "藤原古木古曾" or "藤原古木古曾," was a noble female during the Heian period who was the wife of FUJIWARA no Sukemichi.
sen.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。

sen.j: 夫と同様にせん子女王と何らかの争いをしたためか、長元4年（1031年）壱岐国に流罪となる。
sen.e: Like her husband, probably because she had some sort of fight against Princess Senshi, she was banished to the Iki province in 1031.
Like her husband, probably because she had some sort of fight with Princess Senshi, was banished to the Iki province in 1031.
Like her husband, probably because she had some sort of fight with Princess Senshi, was banished to the Iki Province in 1031.
sen.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。

sen.j: その後の消息は不明である。
sen.e: There is no information about her life thereafter.
There is no further information about her life thereafter.
There is no further information about her life thereafter.
